Text.Name: Item_SysSickle
Text.Desc: A set of farm tools can hugely increase your farming speed and harvesting speed.

Text.Name: Item_Gong12
Text.Desc: A school of teachings thought to come from the Golden Immortal Yunzhong Zi. It found a new way outside of the traditional system of Xiandao Cultivation. Seizing the moment of breakthrough, one would be able to congeal five Natal Talismans, which have fascinating uses.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine
